module.title: Recruitment
Recruitment
招聘
module.description: Provide recruitment module to user, includes jobs insert/update/delete, and manage job applications.
Provide recruitment module to user, includes jobs insert/update/delete, and manage job applications.
给用户提供搭建招聘系统功能，包含工作的添加/更新/删除，及工作申请和管理申请人等功能。
